item.title: Sketch for a new programming language
item.description: I’m coming up with the spec of a new programming language. Working title: “Compost”. Don’t worry, it’s just for fun. For now this is just a first sketch of the ideas I had today. They are subject to change. The main idea of the language is ultimate composability and recomposability. It forces the programmer to think in terms of the minimum amount of dependencies required for each part of the code, and makes each part as reusable as possible.
